mapper.select: SELECT A.MODELTIME, CAST(SUBSTRING(A.MODELTIME, 9, 2) AS INTEGER) SHOW_TEXT, CASE WHEN A.MODELTIME > GETDATE() THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_DISABLED, CASE WHEN A.MODELTIME = #{maxDate} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS IS_MAX_DATE, CASE WHEN B.MODELTIME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS IS_DATA FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR (10), dateadd(D, NUMBER, #{month} + '-01') - 1, 23) AS MODELTIME FROM master..spt_values WHERE TYPE = 'p' AND NUMBER BETWEEN 1 AND ( SELECT datediff(DAY,#{month} + '-01', dateadd(MONTH,1, #{month} + '-01')))) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR, MODELTIME, 23) MODELTIME FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT CONVERT(VARCHAR, MODELTIME, 23) MODELTIME FROM [AIR_FORECAST].[T_BAS_MODELWQ_DAY_ROW] WHERE POINTCODE = #{pointCode} AND MODEL = #{model} AND MODELTIME >= CONVERT ( datetime , #{month} + '-01' , 20 ) AND MODELTIME < DATEADD( MONTH , 1 , CONVERT (datetime , #{month} + '-01' , 20)) ) T ) B ON A.MODELTIME = B.MODELTIME ORDER BY SHOW_TEXT
